item.description:
Okay, our second experience here was MUCH more satisfying, so we'll likely continue to use it for a while. They have banquet facilities in the back, including a wall projector, so we hope to be able to display some of the odd bits we've collected for those who attend!

They have a decent buffet going til 8:00 - $12 per person.

See ya'll there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the person who resembles my profile image, but ask at the entry anyhow!
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group October Meetup
